summary:
We’re well into times in which it’s clear why you’d care to own your data and host the software that you depend on.  Enshittification and surveillance capitalism are not heterodox concepts, so I won’t make that the point of this post. 
Yet, people on the internet can be quick to dissuade you from doing so...
title: What self-hosting teaches

summary: Well, I found a stumbling block on Linux.  So much of what I do requires some sort of image editing and manipulation.  I would use Affinity Photo, Affinity Designer, and Paint...
title: A Great (Image) Manipulator

summary: Space Karen Jr, Matt Mullenweg, has continued his scorched earth policy on his reputation with another strange post.  This time defending his mother (which is admirable) against some pretty weird
title: Man of the people, Matt Mullenweg

title: The Morning Checklist
